comments: This contract was competitively sourced.This contract includes one or more amendments.This contract is a multi-year contract.This contract is a call-up against a PWGSC Procurement tool. REPAVING - FORT LANGLEY & GULF OF GEORGIA CANNERY HISTORIAL SITES. Amendment over 150%: To conduct an assessment of soil quality at Gulf of Georgia Cannery Historic Site, Richmond, BC to evaluate management option for soil that may be removed in conjunction with the removal of existing asphalt and re-instatement of new asphalt.
